name: Fortnite: Summer Legends Pack
summary:
Grab your tropical drink, apply suntan lotion and sport your favorite sunnies because it's time to chill with the Summer Legends! Includes the following cosmetics:

- Tropical Punch Zoey Outfit
- Sour Swirl Back Bling
- Unpeely Outfit (includes additional styles)
- Banana Cabana Back Bling
- Summer Fable Outfit (includes additional styles)
- Trapper Pack Back Bling
